item.title: Bulk Cargo Door Pressure Stop Fitting Assemblies

remarks.para: One forward fitting assembly or one aft fitting assembly may be missing or inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: There are no visible defects on remaining fitting assemblies for associated door,
Cabin altitude auto controller is operative, and
Maximum cabin pressure differential is limited to 5.2 psi.
In automatic Cabin Altitude control, comply with maximum cabin pressure differential limit of 5.2 by not exceeding the 11,000 feet MSL maximum aircraft altitude.
Flight is limited to 11,000 feet MSL en route altitude.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "BULK CARGO DOOR PRESSURE STOP FITTING INOP_ MAX CABIN PRESSURE DIFF – 5.2 PSI". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually inspect remaining fittings on affected door(s) for defects.
